mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DETAILMACHINE(MACHINE_NO, FM_NO, MACHINE_NAME, MACHINE_INFORMATION, MACHINE_RENTALCOST, LOCATION_NO2) VALUES(#{machineNo}, #{fmNo}, #{machineName}, #{machineInformation}, #{machineRentalCost}, #{locationNo2})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DETAILMACHINE WHERE machine_no = #{ machineNo }
mapper.select: SELECT r.MEMBER_ID "memberId", r.HISTORY_RENTALDATE "historyRentalDate", r.HISTORY_RETURNDATE "historyReturnDate", r.HISTORY_STATUS "historyStatus", r.MACHINE_NO "machineNo" FROM RENTAL_HISTORY r, MEMBER m WHERE r.member_id = m.member_id AND m.location_name2 = #{ locationName }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_EDUCATION(education_no, fm_no, member_id, education_name, education_expiredate) VALUES(member_education_sequence.nextval, #{fmNo}, #{memberId}, #{educationName}, #{educationExpireDate})
mapper.select: SELECT education_no, fm_no, member_id, education_data, education_name, education_expiredate FROM MEMBER_EDUCATION WHERE member_id = #{ memberId }
